products.title: HP S2031
products.description:
The HP S2031 is a 20” widescreen LCD monitor released as a downgrade from the more expensive albeit superior HP 2509m. It hosts a weaker 1600x900 resolution coupled with a reduced contrast ratio, brightness, and pixel pitch, not to mention a slower response time. Plus it gets rid of its superior counterpart’s speaker system. However, the HP S2031 can connect to a variety of sources VGA, DVI-D w/HDCP), be tilted from top to botton, and even be mounted to a wall via a detachable base and a separately purchased wall adapter.

Features

  • ENERGY STAR 5.0 Qualified
  • 20” Widescreen LCD Monitor
  • 1600x900 Resolution
  • Dual Monitor Support
  • Tilt Feature
  • Two-Lamp Panel (50% Power Consumption)
  • Recyclable Plastics/Packaging
  • Standard Vesa Mounting

Specifications

  • Display: 20” Widescreen Thin-Film Transistor LCD Active Matrix
  • Native Resolution: 1600x900
  • Dynamic Contrast: 15,000:1
  • Contrast Ratio: 700:1
  • Brightness: 200 Nits
  • Pixel Pitch: .2768 mm
  • Responsible Time: 5 ms
  • Connectors: VGA, DVI-D, HDCP
  • Audio: 2W/Channel

pros.text: blue LED indicator light can be turned off
built with recycled materials - a "green" monitor
value - inexpensive, good for basic computing tasks

cons.text: no built-in speakers - commonly found on entry level monitors
not Full HD compliant - only capable of displaying 720p content
poor stand - only capable of tilt motion
slow response time - only suitable for light gaming
CCFL backlit - not as energy efficient as competing LED-based displays

related.title: HP 2509m
related.description:
The HP 2509m is a 25” widescreen LCD monitor designed to accommodate two or more Windows at the same time. It can relay onscreen content at a full 1920 x 1080p high-definition resolution and 60,000:1 dynamic contrast ratio for subtle colors mixed with deeper blacks and brighter whites. Plus it uses HP BrightView technology to further sharpen images, as well as reduce glares. Signature to the HP 2509m is its connectivity options, which include standard VGA, DVI-D with HDCP, and HDMI. Additional features include a tilt/swivel feature for adjusting the monitor left-to-right or top-to-bottom, integrated speakers, and vesa mount compatibility.

Features

  • 25” Widescreen LCD Monitor
  • Full HD Video Resolution
  • Anti-Glare Technology
  • Dual Monitor Support
  • HDCP / Copyright Content
  • Tilt & Swivel Feature
  • Integrated Speakers
  • Standard Vesa Mounting

Specifications

  • Display: 25” Widescreen Thin-Film Transistor LCD Active Matrix
  • Native Resolution: 1080p
  • Dynamic Contrast: 60,000:1
  • Contrast Ratio: 1000:1
  • Brightness: 300 Nits
  • Pixel Pitch: .288 mm
  • Responsible Time: 3 ms
  • Connectors: VGA, DVI-D, HDMI
  • Audio: 2W/Channel

pros.text: great for movies - supports 1080p video and HDMI input
supports all of the major video input options - VGA, DVI-D and HDMI
fast response time - good for gaming
nice stand - allows a keyboard to be tucked under the display
large panel - slightly larger than most 1080p monitors

cons.text: glossy bezel - attracts fingerprints and dust

products.title: HP S2031a
products.description:
The HPS2031a model is a 20" mid-grade LCD monitor designed to compliment everyday computer use. The HPS2031a features a dynamic contrast ratio of 15,000:1 and a native resolution of 1600x900 with a 5ms total response time.

The HPS2031a computer monitor features Energy Star 5.0 compliance to ensure it does not use an excess of power during operation and HP claims the two-lamp panel (as opposed to a four lamp panel) contains "up to 50% less mercury" which means a lower total power consumption. The HPS2031a monitor also includes integrated speakers, VGA, DVI and HDCP ports, and a one year limited warranty offered through the manufacturer HP complete with online/phone support as well.

Features

  • Mid-grade LCD Technology Monitor
  • 20" Diagonal Widescreen
  • Energy Star 5.0 Compliance
    • 50% Less Mercury
    • Two-Lamp Panel
  • Integrated Speakers
  • One Year Limited Manufacturer's Warranty
  • HP Online/Phone Setup and Troubleshooting Support

Specifications

  • Native Resolution: 1600x900
  • Contrast Ratio
    • Typical: 1000:1
    • Dynamic: 15,000:1
  • Brightness: 250nits
  • Pixel Pitch: 0.2768mm x 0.2768mm
  • Response Rate: 5ms
  • Inputs
    • VGA
    • DVI
    • HDCP
  • Monitor Tilt: (+15 up to -15 degrees down)
  • Dimensions
    • 14.59"(H) x 18.82"(W) x 7.09"(D)
  • Included (in the box)
    • Monitor
    • Power Cable
    • VGA Cable
    • DVI Cable
    • Audio Cable
    • CD with Instructions
    • Warranty Card

pros.text: great for general use - supports up to 720p video
good picture quality - produces bright, crisp images
nice aesthetics - implements a smooth, curved LCD bezel

cons.text: glossy bezel and stand - easily attracts dust and fingerprints
lacks 1080p support - not Full HD compliant
not the best choice for gamers - slower 5ms response time means potentially blurry imagery
poor stand ergonomics - only capable of tilting back/forward
uses an annoying bright blue LED light to indicate the monitor is turned on
